name: CoronaFighter
description:
In the tradition of classic arcade shoot-em-ups comes CoronaFighter. You are a white blood cell attempting to clear coronavirus particles from your host's nasal passages. Armed with an antibody cannon and an array of special weapons, you set off on your mission. But you face long odds, for the virions keep coming.

Features include:
- First stage of the final game
- Upgradable antibody cannon
- Special weapons including TNF Laser, Cytokine Wave, NK Charge and Complement Shield
- Oxidative Burst bombs

Clear the patients nasal passages of all virus, and infected cells to win.
